title: Constructivist Micro-World-Based Learning Design and Digital Tool Support Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of learning theories in higher education environments, experience with digital tools
context.additional_context: Learners are graduate students with advanced social science knowledge; the course strengthens learning design capabilities through constructivist approaches in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can apply core principles of constructivist microworlds to design learning in social contexts.
Learners can develop a concrete design framework to model and evaluate learner experiences using digital tools.
Learners can design and implement personalized learning activities that reflect diverse cognitive processes and learner needs.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
